q: and Piers Morgan . However, Amanda revealed that Simon Cowell would return to the panel for the live rounds of the talent show, hosted again this year by TV favourites Ant and Dec. Amanda said: David Hasselhoff has settled into the job really well, the only thing he keeps doing is trying to entertain the audience all the time! " Simon Cowell is so busy doing The X Factor in America, so we're lucky to get him back for the live shows. It's brilliant- it's like the king's away and all his little courtiers are all playing- we've been quite naughty! Amanda looked the picture of glamour as she arrived at the Opera House, with a Marilyn Monroe-esque hairdo and wearing a white cape-style coat hiding her baby bump. Donald Rumsfeld also defends the use of harsh interrogation tactics in his interview, saying that they "saved lives." But he also admits that interrogators went past his orders with at least one detainee, Mohammed al-Qahtani : Qahtani would be subjected to sexual humiliation and long periods of sleep deprivation and isolation while in custody at Guantanamo, and his heartbeat at one point dropped to 35 beats per minute.
